snippet: Two panels appointed by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo suggested that the state create a strategic fuel reserve, require some gas stations to install generators and update its building codes.
abstract: Two panels appointed by Gov Andrew M. Cuomo suggest New York should create a strategic fuel reserve, require some gas stations to install generators and update its building codes; panels were charged with studying how state can better prepare for disasters like Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Two panels appointed by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo suggested that the state create a strategic fuel reserve, require some gas stations to install generators and update its building codes.

headline.seo: Experts Offer Cuomo Recommendations on Disaster Preparedness
headline.main: Experts Advise Cuomo on Disaster Measures
headline.print_headline: Experts Advise Cuomo on Disaster Measures
